subject: Your online game account information
text:
This e-mail is being sent to you because it was used in registering to play 
our online game: https://robert.hurst-ri.us/games/dankdomain 

You may sign in with the following account information: 

Your account ID is:		${player.id}  (${player.handle}) 
Your account Password is:	${player.password} 

If this e-mail was sent to you by mistake, please take no action, 
as this game account will deactivate in a few days.  

The latest developments for Dank Domain: 

	https://www.npmjs.com/package/dankdomain

Happy hunting!
